resume.name: SHRUTI PARK

experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experience.description: Conducted intensive research on stochastic modeling for catastrophe risk assessment. Utilized R and SQL to analyze historical property-casualty data, identifying key predictors for high-severity loss events. Presented findings on the impact of climate volatility on long-term premium stability to faculty and industry partners.

experience.title: Actuarial Research Project Lead
experience.description: Led a team of three in a research project focused on survival analysis and mortality rate projections. Developed a Python-based framework to automate the cleaning and validation of large demographic datasets. Applied Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) to refine life expectancy estimates for diverse policyholder cohorts.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
